description: These slow cooked brownies are fudgy, delicious and toasty studded with walnuts.
name: Slow Cooker Chocolate & Walnut Brownies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Grease the slow cooker basin with a little butter, add a layer of foil and parchment paper and grease it. Melt the butter and dark chocolate in a bowl in the microwave in 30 second bursts, stirring in between. Leave to cool slightly.
Combine the eggs and caster sugar in a large bowl and stir in the chocolate mix. Fold in the flour and cocoa powder and mix to combine. Stir in chocolate chips and walnuts.
Tip the batter into the slow cooker and cover with the lid. Cook for 4 hours on low, turn off the slow cooker and leave to stand for 1 hour before removing the lid and slicing.
